mapper.sql: a.withdrawals_id AS "withdrawalsId", a.withdrawals_money AS "withdrawalsMoney", a.withdrawals_user_id AS "withdrawalsUserId", a.withdrawals_user_name AS "withdrawalsUserName", a.withdrawals_add_date AS "withdrawalsAddDate", a.withdrawals_modify_date AS "withdrawalsModifyDate", a.withdrawals_state AS "withdrawalsState", a.withdrawals_modify_user_id AS "withdrawalsModifyUserId", a.withdrawals_modify_user_name AS "withdrawalsModifyUserName", a.withdrawals_desc AS "withdrawalsDesc", a.withdrawals_fact_money AS "withdrawalsFactMoney", a.withdrawals_order_num AS "withdrawalsOrderNum", a.withdrawals_tborder_state AS "withdrawalsTborderState", a.withdrawals_url AS "withdrawalsUrl", a.withdrawals_remark AS "withdrawalsRemark", a.pay_no AS "payNo", a.pay_name AS "payName"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_users_money_audit( withdrawals_id, withdrawals_money, withdrawals_user_id, withdrawals_user_name, withdrawals_add_date, withdrawals_modify_date, withdrawals_state, withdrawals_modify_user_id, withdrawals_modify_user_name, withdrawals_desc, withdrawals_fact_money, withdrawals_order_num, withdrawals_tborder_state, withdrawals_url, withdrawals_remark, pay_no, pay_name ) VALUES ( #{withdrawalsId}, #{withdrawalsMoney}, #{withdrawalsUserId}, #{withdrawalsUserName}, #{withdrawalsAddDate}, #{withdrawalsModifyDate}, #{withdrawalsState}, #{withdrawalsModifyUserId}, #{withdrawalsModifyUserName}, #{withdrawalsDesc}, #{withdrawalsFactMoney}, #{withdrawalsOrderNum}, #{withdrawalsTborderState}, #{withdrawalsUrl}, #{withdrawalsRemark}, #{payNo}, #{payName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_users_money_audit SET withdrawals_id = #{withdrawalsId}, withdrawals_money = #{withdrawalsMoney}, withdrawals_user_id = #{withdrawalsUserId}, withdrawals_user_name = #{withdrawalsUserName}, withdrawals_add_date = #{withdrawalsAddDate}, withdrawals_modify_date = #{withdrawalsModifyDate}, withdrawals_state = #{withdrawalsState}, withdrawals_modify_user_id = #{withdrawalsModifyUserId}, withdrawals_modify_user_name = #{withdrawalsModifyUserName}, withdrawals_desc = #{withdrawalsDesc}, withdrawals_fact_money = #{withdrawalsFactMoney}, withdrawals_order_num = #{withdrawalsOrderNum}, withdrawals_tborder_state = #{withdrawalsTborderState}, withdrawals_url = #{withdrawalsUrl}, withdrawals_remark = #{withdrawalsRemark}, pay_no = #{payNo}, pay_name = #{payName} WHERE id = #{id}
